channel.title: Port Forwarding: Belkin Router
channel.description:
Hello.
I am trying to port forward because I am trying to make a server. I have a Belkin router, and if you need the Belkin Router Model number, I can provide that too.
I typed in the gateway address: 192.168.2.1
Can anyone help me with this?
Thank you.

item.title: Port Forwarding: Belkin Router
item.dc:creator: @Captain_Lover Captain Lover
item.description:
@Captain_Lover wrote:

Alright, I added you.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2008, 04:46:05 PM[/size][hr]In the TestScape source, when I run the runserver file, it continues saying:

Srarting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

What is it supposed to say if it runs successfully on my server that other players can login to?

How do I fix this so other players can login to my server?

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Port Forwarding: Belkin Router

item.description:
@system wrote:

Add me on msn, I might/will be able to add you. (startdafunk@hotmail.com)
